subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Niclas Bergfors scored two power-play goals 3 minutes 13 seconds apart in the third period to break open a tie game and send the host Devils to a 3-2 victory over the Alex Ovechkin-less Washington Capitals on Wednesday night.
snippet: Niclas Bergfors scored two power-play goals 3 minutes 13 seconds apart in the third period to break open a tie game and send the host Devils to a 3-2 victory over the Alex Ovechkin-less Washington Capitals on Wednesday night.
